title: Salomon Men's S/Pro X90 Cs Ski Boots
description: The alpine ski boots "S/PRO X90 CS" designed exclusively for Intersport by Salomon with seamless 3D inner shoe is just right for long days on the slopes. The COREFRAME construction ensures a low weight, increased driving feel and more power, while the CUSTOM SHELL technology used for the outer shell provides optimal and individual adjustability. The ski boots with a strip width of 100 mm and a flex of 90 have four finely adjustable aluminium micro buckles that optimise the comfort and fit.
